on top of something.translation[0].defin: on the highest surface of something
There should be an envelope on top of the fridge.
in complete control of a situation
Don’t worry; I’m back on top of things now.
I should be more on top of my work next week.
if something bad happens to you on top of something else, it happens when you have other problems
On top of everything else, I now have to go to work next Saturday!
